name: Air Threat
description: This is a game in which you have to control your own military aircraft. Get ready for the most unforgettable and enchanting aerial confrontation of all time!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 30 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 50 MB available space
